default_template_sid.description: The unique identifier for the default template used for verification messages.

tts_name.description: The name used for text-to-speech (TTS) in verification calls.

psd2_enabled.description: Indicates if PSD2 (Payment Services Directive 2) verification is enabled.

do_not_share_warning_enabled.description: Indicates if the 'do not share' warning is enabled for verification codes.

mailer_sid.description: Unique identifier for the mailer service associated with the verify service.

friendly_name.description: A user-friendly name for the verify service.

url.description: The URL associated with the verify service.

account_sid.description: Unique identifier for the account associated with the verify service.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the verify service was last updated.

totp.description: Object containing configuration settings for Time-based One-Time Password (TOTP) verification method.

time_step.description: The time step interval for generating TOTP codes.

skew.description: The time skew allowed for TOTP code validation.

code_length.description: The number of digits in the TOTP (Time-based One-Time Password) code.

issuer.description: The issuer name included in TOTP messages.

code_length.description: The number of digits in the verification code sent to users.

custom_code_enabled.description: Indicates whether custom verification codes are enabled.

sid.description: Unique identifier for the verify service.

push.description: Object containing configuration settings for push verification method.

apn_credential_sid.description: Unique identifier for the APN (Apple Push Notification) credential associated with the verify service.

include_date.description: Indicates if the date should be included in push notifications.

fcm_credential_sid.description: Unique identifier for the FCM (Firebase Cloud Messaging) credential associated with the verify service.

date_created.description: The date and time when the verify service was created.

dtmf_input_required.description: Indicates whether DTMF input is required during verification.

skip_sms_to_landlines.description: Indicates whether SMS messages are skipped for landline numbers during verification.

lookup_enabled.description: Indicates if phone number lookup is enabled for the verify service.

links.description: Object containing related hyperlinks for verify_services data.

verification_checks.description: Links related to verification checks for the verify service.

rate_limits.description: Links related to rate limits for the verify service.

entities.description: Links related to entities associated with the verify service.

access_tokens.description: Links related to access tokens for the verify service.

verifications.description: Links related to verifications performed using the verify service.

webhooks.description: Links related to webhooks for the verify service.

messaging_configurations.description: Links related to messaging configurations for the verify service.
